exceptions.summary:
Thrown when the schema is not a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" /> with logical type
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" /> or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" />.
Thrown when the type is not <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.
